snippet: The judge would not rule on whether the Constitution applied to the tribunal case involving the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks, and refused to dismiss the Cole bombing case.
abstract: Military judge Col James Pohl declines to rule on whether Constitution applies to military tribunal case involving Sept 11 terrorist attacks; also rejects defense motion to throw out tribunal charges in case involving the bombing of the American destroyer Cole in 2000.
lead_paragraph: The judge would not rule on whether the Constitution applied to the tribunal case involving the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks, and refused to dismiss the Cole bombing case.

headline.seo: Defense Requests Rejected at 9/11 and Cole Hearings
headline.main: Military Judge Rejects Defense Requests at Terror Hearings
headline.print_headline: Military Judge Rejects Defense Requests at Terror Hearings

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
